summary: Xiaomi, founded in 2010, focuses on smartphones, smart hardware, and IoT platforms. With a mission to create affordable, innovative products globally, Xiaomi emphasizes technology, cost-effectiveness, and product appeal. The company's strategies for the next decade include redefining entrepreneurship, integrating internet with manufacturing, and ensuring steady progress. Xiaomi aims to drive innovation, shape smart living, boost Chinese manufacturing, and enhance global lifestyles. Embracing a vision of progress and excellence, Xiaomi aspires to lead in engineering and shape future lifestyles.
